named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByParentJobunitIdAndJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobId ASC

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJobType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.jobType = :jobType ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.monitorId = :monitorId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId OR a.srcFacilityId = :facilityId OR a.destFacilityId = :facilityId OR (a.resourceTargetId = :facilityId AND a.resourceType = 0) ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJoblinkSendSettingId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.joblinkSendSettingId = :joblinkSendSettingId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByJobunitIdAndRegisteredModule
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.registeredModule = :registeredModule ORDER BY a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByIconId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.iconId = :iconId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findJobIdByQueueId
named-query.query: SELECT a.id.jobId FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.queueId = :queueId

named-query.name: JobMstEntity.findByApprovalUserId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobMstEntity a WHERE a.approvalReqUserId = :approvalReqUserId

named-query.name: JobInfoEntity.findByIconId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobInfoEntity a WHERE a.iconId = :iconId

named-query.name: JobInfoEntity.findByJobType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobInfoEntity a WHERE a.jobType = :jobType ORDER BY a.id.sessionId

named-query.name: JobParamMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobParamMstEntity.findByJobunitIdParamId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.paramId = :paramId

named-query.name: JobParamInfoEntity.findBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobParamInfoEntity.findBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.paramId

named-query.name: JobWaitGroupInfoEntity.findByTargetJobId
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a FROM JobWaitGroupInfoEntity a JOIN a.jobWaitInfoEntities b WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND b.id.targetJobId = :targetJobId AND b.id.targetJobType NOT IN :excludingTypes ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobWaitInfoEntity.findByTypeJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobWaitInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId AND a.id.targetJobType = :type ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.orderNo

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findByTriggerInfo
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.triggerInfo = :triggerInfo

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findBySessionIdJobkickIdAndStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.sessionGenerateJobkickId = :sessionGenerateJobkickId AND a.sessionId LIKE :sessionId AND EXISTS ( select 'X' FROM JobSessionJobEntity b WHERE b.id.sessionId = a.sessionId AND b.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND b.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND b.status = :status )

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findBySessionIdJobkickId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.sessionGenerateJobkickId = :sessionGenerateJobkickId AND a.sessionId LIKE :sessionId AND EXISTS ( select 'X' FROM JobSessionJobEntity b WHERE b.id.sessionId = a.sessionId AND b.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND b.parentJobId = :parentJobId )

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findByJobkickIdAndStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.sessionGenerateJobkickId = :sessionGenerateJobkickId AND EXISTS ( select 'X' FROM JobSessionJobEntity b WHERE b.id.sessionId = a.sessionId AND b.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND b.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND b.status = :status )

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findByScheduleDateAndStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.scheduleDate <= :scheduleDate AND EXISTS ( select 'X' FROM JobSessionJobEntity b WHERE b.id.sessionId = a.sessionId AND b.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND b.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND b.status = :status )

named-query.name: JobSessionEntity.findByScheduleDateStatusAndOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionEntity a WHERE a.scheduleDate <= :scheduleDate AND EXISTS ( select 'X' FROM JobSessionJobEntity b WHERE b.id.sessionId = a.sessionId AND b.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND b.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND b.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId AND b.status = :status )

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findUnendSessions
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.status IN :statuses AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId ORDER BY a.startDate ASC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findAllChild
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findChild
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByJobSessionId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.status = :status ORDER BY a.startDate ASC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByJobSessionIdAndStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findBySessionStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionEntity b WHERE a.id.jobId = b.jobId AND a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findBySessionStatuses
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionEntity b WHERE a.id.jobId = b.jobId AND a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status IN :statuses ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByParentStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId AND a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByStartDate
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.parentJobunitId = :parentJobunitId AND a.parentJobId = :parentJobId ORDER BY a.startDate

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByJobunitIdJobIdEndDate
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId AND a.endDate >= :endDate ORDER BY a.endDate DESC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findBySessionStatusesAndJobTypes
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a JOIN a.jobInfoEntity b WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.status IN :statuses AND b.jobType IN :jobTypes ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByIdsDesc
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId ANDã€€a.startDate != null AND a.endDate != null AND a.status IN :statusList ORDER BY a.startDate DESC

named-query.name: JobSessionJobEntity.findByIdsTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionJobEntity a WHERE (a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId) IN :jobIds AND a.endDate >= :fromTime AND a.startDate <= :toTime ORDER BY a.startDate

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByStatusStartIsNull
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status IN :statusList AND a.startDate IS NULL ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status = :status ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByFacilityIdStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status IN :statusList AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.startupTime = :startupTime AND a.instanceId = :instanceId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByDifferentStartuptime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a WHERE a.status IN :statusList AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId AND a.startupTime != :startupTime AND a.startupTime != 0 AND a.instanceId = :instanceId ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByJobTypeEndIsNull
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionJobEntity b JOIN b.jobInfoEntity c WHERE c.jobType = :jobType AND a.startDate IS NOT NULL AND a.endDate IS NULL ORDER BY a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId, a.id.facilityId

named-query.name: JobSessionNodeEntity.findByJobTypeStatus
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobSessionNodeEntity a JOIN a.jobSessionJobEntity b JOIN b.jobInfoEntity c WHERE a.status = :status AND c.jobType = :jobType

named-query.name: JobKickEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobKickEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.jobkickId

named-query.name: JobKickEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobKickEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.jobkickId

named-query.name: JobKickEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobKickEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.jobkickId

named-query.name: JobKickEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobKickEntity a ORDER BY a.jobkickId

named-query.name: JobKickEntity.findByJobKickType
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobKickEntity a WHERE a.jobkickType = :jobkickType ORDER BY a.jobkickId

named-query.name: JobEditEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobEditEntity a ORDER BY a.jobunitId

named-query.name: JobmapIconImageEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobmapIconImageEntity a ORDER BY a.iconId

named-query.name: JobParamMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobParamMstEntity a

named-query.name: JobWaitGroupMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobWaitGroupMstEntity a

named-query.name: JobWaitGroupMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobWaitGroupMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobCommandParamMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobCommandParamMstEntity a

named-query.name: JobCommandParamMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobCommandParamMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobEnvVariableMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobEnvVariableMstEntity a

named-query.name: JobEnvVariableMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobEnvVariableMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobNextJobOrderMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobNextJobOrderMstEntity a

named-query.name: JobNextJobOrderMstEntity.findByJobunitId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobNextJobOrderMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId ORDER BY a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobNextJobOrderMstEntity.findByJobunitIdJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobNextJobOrderMstEntity a WHERE a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId ORDER BY a.order DESC, a.id.nextJobId

named-query.name: JobNextJobOrderInfoEntity.findBySessionIdJobunitIdJobId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobNextJobOrderInfoEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId ORDER BY a.order DESC, a.id.nextJobId

named-query.name: JobQueueEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobQueueEntity a

named-query.name: JobQueueItemEntity.findByQueueId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobQueueItemEntity a WHERE a.id.queueId = :queueId ORDER BY a.regDate, a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobQueueItemEntity.findByQueueIdAndStatusId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobQueueItemEntity a WHERE a.id.queueId = :queueId AND a.statusId = :statusId ORDER BY a.regDate, a.id.sessionId, a.id.jobunitId, a.id.jobId

named-query.name: JobQueueItemEntity.countByQueueId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM JobQueueItemEntity a WHERE a.id.queueId = :queueId

named-query.name: JobQueueItemEntity.countByQueueIdAndStatusId
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(a) FROM JobQueueItemEntity a WHERE a.id.queueId = :queueId AND a.statusId = :statusId

named-query.name: JobQueueItemEntity.countPerQueueId
named-query.query: SELECT a.id.queueId, COUNT(a.id.queueId), SUM(CASE WHEN a.statusId = :statusId THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM JobQueueItemEntity a GROUP BY a.id.queueId

named-query.name: JobLinkSendSettingEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobLinkSendSettingEntity a ORDER BY a.joblinkSendSettingId

named-query.name: JobLinkSendSettingEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobLinkSendSettingEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.joblinkSendSettingId

named-query.name: JobRpaLoginResolutionMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobRpaLoginResolutionMstEntity a ORDER BY a.orderNo

named-query.name: JobRpaScreenshotEntity.findBySessionIdJobunitIdJobIdFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobRpaScreenshotEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.outputDate DESC

named-query.name: JobRpaRunConditionEntity.findBySessionIdJobunitIdJobIdFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobRpaRunConditionEntity a WHERE a.id.sessionId = :sessionId AND a.id.jobunitId = :jobunitId AND a.id.jobId = :jobId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId

named-query.name: JobRpaRunConditionEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM JobRpaRunConditionEntity a
